page.title: 12LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: In West Calder if people want to go swimming they have to go to Polbeth to West Calder High School.The swimming is held on Monday and Tuesday night.You cannot go any other time as it is used by the school.Another activity is the running club which is also on on a Monday night,you start by running from West Calder Community Centre to the high school.The club leader is a lady called Tracy Davidson.For children under the age of 16 there is Highland,Tap and Disco dancing,these are held at the community centre.For boys there is break dancing on a Monday night.On a Wednesday there is keep fit or ladies and on Tuesday and Friday there is judo for the whole family.
